name: Plank
description: Start in a push-up position, but instead of lowering yourself to the ground, hold yourself up with your forearms and toes for a set amount of time.

name: Crunches
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your hands behind your head. Lift your shoulders off the ground by contracting your abs, then lower back down.

name: Russian twists
description: Sit on the ground with your knees bent and your feet off the ground. Twist your torso from side to side while holding a weight or your hands together.

name: Bicycle crunches
description: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head. Bring your left elbow to your right knee while straightening your left leg, then switch to the other side.

name: Reverse crunches
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your hands by your sides. Lift your hips off the ground by contracting your lower abs, then lower back down.

name: Dead bug
description: Lie on your back with your arms and legs in the air. Lower your opposite arm and leg towards the ground while keeping your back flat, then switch sides.

name: Side plank
description: Lie on your side with your forearm on the ground and your feet stacked on top of each other. Lift your hips off the ground and hold.

name: Mountain climbers
description: Start in a push-up position, then bring your right knee towards your chest. Quickly switch to the other side, as if you're running in place.

name: Leg raises
description: Lie on your back with your legs straight. Lift your legs off the ground by contracting your lower abs, then lower back down.

name: Woodchoppers
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight or medicine ball. Twist your torso to one side and bring the weight up and across your body, then repeat on the other side.

name: Bicep curls
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand. Curl the weights towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps, then lower back down.

name: Tricep dips
description: Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands on either side of your hips. Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up.

name: Hammer curls
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand. Curl the weights towards your shoulders with your palms facing in, then lower back down.

name: Tricep pushdowns
description: Stand in front of a cable machine with a rope or bar attachment. Push the attachment down towards your thighs by contracting your triceps, then release back up.

name: Wrist curls
description: Sit on a bench or chair with a weight in one hand and your forearm resting on your leg. Curl the weight towards your wrist by contracting your forearm, then lower back down.

name: Reverse curls
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand with your palms facing down. Curl the weights towards your shoulders by contracting your forearms, then lower back down.

name: Concentration curls
description: Sit on a bench or chair with a weight in one hand and your elbow resting on your inner thigh. Curl the weight towards your shoulder by contracting your biceps, then lower back down.

name: Skull crushers
description: Lie on a bench or the ground with a weight in each hand. Lower the weights towards your head by bending your elbows, then push back up.

name: Preacher curls
description: Sit at a preacher bench with a weight in each hand. Curl the weights towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps, then lower back down.

name: Overhead tricep extensions
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in both hands above your head. Lower the weight behind your head by bending your elbows, then push back up.

name: Pull-ups
description: Hang from a bar with your hands shoulder-width apart and palms facing away from you. Pull your body up towards the bar by contracting your back and biceps, then lower back down.

name: Bent-over rows
description: Hold a weight in each hand with your palms facing down and hinge forward at the hips. Pull the weights towards your chest by contracting your back and biceps, then lower back down.

name: Lat pulldowns
description: Sit at a lat pulldown machine with a wide bar attachment. Pull the bar down towards your chest by contracting your back and biceps, then release back up.

name: Seated cable rows
description: Sit at a cable row machine with a V-bar attachment. Pull the attachment towards your chest by contracting your back and biceps, then release back out.

name: T-bar rows
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with a V-handle attachment. Pull the bar towards your chest by contracting your back and biceps, then lower back down.

name: Dumbbell rows
description: Hold a weight in one hand with your other hand and knee resting on a bench. Pull the weight towards your chest by contracting your back and biceps, then lower back down.

name: Good mornings
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell resting on your upper back. Hinge forward at the hips while keeping your back straight, then lift back up to standing.

name: Back extensions
description: Lie face down on a back extension machine with your feet secured. Lift your upper body towards the ceiling by contracting your back and glutes, then lower back down.

name: Reverse flyes
description: Hold a weight in each hand with your palms facing away from you and hinge forward at the hips. Lift the weights out to the sides by contracting your back and shoulders, then lower back down.

name: Bench press
description: Lie on a bench with a barbell above you. Lower the bar down towards your chest, then push it back up using your chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Push-ups
description: Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body down towards the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up using your chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Dumbbell flyes
description: Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand. Lower the dumbbells out to the sides of your body, then bring them back up using your chest muscles.

name: Cable flyes
description: Stand in the middle of a cable machine with a handle in each hand. Extend your arms out to the sides, then bring them back together in front of your body using your chest muscles.

name: Incline bench press
description: Lie on an incline bench with a barbell above you. Lower the bar down towards your upper chest, then push it back up using your upper chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Decline bench press
description: Lie on a decline bench with a barbell above you. Lower the bar down towards your lower chest, then push it back up using your lower chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Chest dips
description: Hold onto parallel bars with your arms straight and feet off the ground. Lower your body down towards the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up using your chest and triceps.

name: Chest press machine
description: Sit in a chest press machine and push the handles forward using your chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Diamond push-ups
description: Start in a plank position with your hands close together, forming a diamond shape with your fingers. Lower your body down towards the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up using your chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Medicine ball chest passes
description: Stand facing a wall with a medicine ball in your hands. Throw the ball at the wall, catch it, and repeat to work your chest muscles.

name: Squats
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips down towards the ground by bending your knees, and then push back up using your legs and glutes.

name: Lunges
description: Start with one foot forward and the other foot back, then lower your body down towards the ground by bending your knees. Push back up using your legs and glutes and alternate legs.

name: Deadlifts
description: Start with a barbell on the ground in front of you. With your feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees, hinge at your hips, and lift the barbell up towards your hips. Lower the barbell back down to the ground and repeat.

name: Leg press
description: Sit in a leg press machine with your feet on the platform. Push the platform away from you using your legs and glutes.

name: Step-ups
description: Start with one foot on a raised platform and the other foot on the ground. Step up onto the platform and then step back down, alternating legs.

name: Calf raises
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and raise up onto the balls of your feet, then lower back down.

name: Leg extensions
description: Sit in a leg extension machine with your feet under the padded bar. Extend your legs straight out in front of you and then lower back down.

name: Glute bridges
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet on the ground. Push your hips up towards the ceiling using your glutes, then lower back down.

name: Bulgarian split squats
description: Start with one foot behind you on a raised platform and the other foot in front of you. Lower your body down towards the ground by bending your knees, then push back up using your legs and glutes. Alternate legs.

name: Box jumps
description: Start with both feet on the ground, then jump up onto a raised platform and jump back down, landing with both feet on the ground. Repeat.
